Package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCentralChallengeRequest  
    CentralChallengeRequest
    The first message sent on connection to a Tandem pump which begins the authorization process.
    Jpake1aRequest
    The first message sent on connection to a Tandem pump which begins the authorization process using the 6-character pairing code -- the first half of the first JPAKE authorization client request.
    Jpake1bRequest
    The second authorization message sent to the pump with V2 authorization style which contains the second half of the first round client output of EcJpake.
    Jpake2Request
    The third authorization message sent to the pump with V2 authorization style which contains the second round of EcJpake.
    Jpake3SessionKeyRequest
    The fourth authorization message sent to the pump with V2 authorization style which triggers Jpake session validation.
    Jpake4KeyConfirmationRequest
    The fifth authorization message sent to the pump with V2 authorization style.
    PumpChallengeRequest
    The second authorization message sent to the pump which contains the HMACed pairing code.
